settings.title: Hype Flags
settings.text: The best dorm room flags, college flags, custom flags, and festival flags available anywhere on the internet.Â

settings.title: Best In Class
settings.text: Since 2018, weâ€™ve been working hard to produce the highest quality flags. We ship from the United States and pride ourselves on customer service and delivering premium products. Our team has tested dozens of materials and production methods to create the best flags for our customers. As we grow, our commitment to providing the highest quality flags will remain. HypeFlags are made to last throughout your entire college experience.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.text: We created HypeFlags during our senior year at SMU in Dallas, TX. It started just as 2 friends making flags with our favorite images and designs to share with our roommates, now we provide flags to every college across America. From the pregame to the party our flags are made to enhance your college experience. Now weâ€™ve graduated but still bringing what we love to students everywhere.

settings.hero_content: HypeFlags is the original and most trusted college flag brand. We offer the highest quality flags available anywhere, always at the low price of just $14.99. Weâ€™re excited for you to join the hype.
settings.our_story_content: Our mission is to help you step up your college experience by providing the best flags at the best price. We create products based on what we love and we pride ourselves on staying up-to-date with the latest trends to ensure you make the most of your living space.

settings.heading: 24/7 Customer Service
settings.text: If you have any questions about ordering just shoot us an email. Our customers deserve support around the clock.

settings.heading: Fast Shipping From The USA
settings.text: We ship orders the same day and guarantee a fast delivery.* We proudly fulfill all orders from the USA.

settings.heading: Easy & Free Returns
settings.text: Changed your mind? Not an issue! Just let us know, our return process is easy and free.

settings.heading: Upload File
settings.text: Just upload your desired image file to get started with your flag.

settings.heading: Customize Flag
settings.text: Using our customization tool simply crop and edit your photo to your preference.

settings.heading: Confirm Your Design
settings.text: Approve your final design using the preview and proceed with checkout.

settings.heading: Paste Tweet URL
settings.text: Just paste the URL of your desired tweet to get started with your flag.

settings.heading: Edit Tweet
settings.text: You can use our edit tweet feature to change the text of the tweet.

settings.heading: Confirm Tweet
settings.text: Check the preview of your tweet flag and proceed with checkout.

settings.title: Thousands Of Satisfied Customers
settings.text: HypeFlags has the best college dorm room flags for guys. We are the original and most trusted flag company with thousands of satisfied customers.Â

settings.heading: Our Shipping Policies
settings.content: *Orders placed before 2pm EST on Monday - Friday will ship same day. If you place an order after this time, it will be shipping the following business day.
settings.content1:
Free Shipping is available on all orders over $25. Priority Shipping: USPS Priority (2-3 Days) Standard Shipping: USPS First Class (3-5 Days)

Please note:
- Custom flags are made to order and have an additional processing time of 5-7 business days.

- Shipping times are from when the shipment is scanned in by the USPS. Processing time is not included in the delivery period.
settings.content2:
HypeFlags offers worldwide shipping. Standard international shipping takes on average 7-10 business days. In some specific countries it can take longer.

All applicable customs fees, taxes and duties are the sole responsibility of the customer.

Please note:
- Custom flags are made to order and have an additional processing time of 3-5 business days.

settings.heading: SHIPPING AND HANDLING
settings.ship_ben_content1: We proudly offer same-day shipping on orders recieved before 2pm EST*
settings.ship_ben_content2: We have two warehouse locations to service customers located anywhere.
settings.ship_ben_content3: With same-day and priority shipping available we ensure fast delivery.

settings.heading: Contact Us Form
settings.return_content:
HypeFlags offers customer support around the clock.
Drop us a line and weâ€™ll respond within 24 hours.

settings.title: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.content: For orders within the USA we offer two shipping options. Standard Shipping takes 3-5 days and Priority Shipping takes 2-3 days. Please note these begin once the order has shipped. Please check our Shipping & Handling page for more information.

settings.title: Can I change the shipping address for my order?
settings.content: Yes, please fill out the form above and make sure to include your order information as well as the new shipping address in full.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.content:
If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can request a return or exchange within thirty (30) days of purchase if the flag is in the original condition and packaging. Custom flags are not eligible to be returned.

To get started with the return/refund process, please complete the form on our Returns & Exchanges page (https://hypeflags.com/pages/returns-exchanges). We are always here if you need any help along the way. Email us at help@hypeflags.com and we can help you with any step.

Once the return is received to our warehouse we will inspect the flags and process the exchange/refund. We are committed to processing refunds quickly, so you will likely receive notice of your refund/exchange within three (3) business of your return arriving at our warehouse. Please keep your return shipping confirmation and tracking number in the event the package is lost.

Returns will be refunded in the original method of payment. While refunds leave our account immediately, they can take 1-2 weeks to be reflected in your account.

settings.title: Do you offer custom flags?
settings.content: Yes! We do offer custom flags. Click here to get started with your custom flag.

settings.title: How big are your flags and what are they made of?
settings.content: Our flags are 3x5 ft and made of 100% polyester.

settings.heading: Get Started With Your Return
settings.return_content: We want you to be fully satisfied with your order and offer easy returns.
settings.return_policy_content:
If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can request a return or exchange within thirty (30) days of purchase if the flag is in the original condition and packaging. Custom flags are not eligible to be returned.

Once the return is received to our warehouse we will inspect the flags and process the exchange/refund. Returns will be refunded in the original method of payment, they may take 1-2 weeks to be reflected in your account.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my custom flag?
settings.content: Custom flags require an additional 5-7 business day processing time. When you complete checkout your order is immediately put into production. Once the order has been processed and completed the shipping time will depend on your selected shipping method and location.

settings.title: What are the file upload specifications?
settings.content: Our flags are 3x5ft so your final edited image will follow a 3:5 image ratio. We recommend you to provide an image that is at least 2000px on the smallest side to ensure clear printing when it is scaled to 3x5ft. You can print with a lower image size however it may appear pixelated or blurry when scaled. Please allow a 5% bleed area on all edges of the flag to ensure no important parts of your image are cut out during production.

settings.title: Are custom flags returnable if I donâ€™t like it?
settings.content: Unfortunately custom flags are not eligible for return. If you feel that there was an issue with the flag or it didnâ€™t turn out as expected please contact us and our team will help find a resolution.

settings.title: Can you design a custom flag for me?
settings.content: Our team does not offer any individual assistance designing custom flags. We recommend using an online tool if you are looking to add text or create a collage of images. Then you can save and upload the file to create your custom flag.

settings.title: Do you offer bulk pricing for custom flags?
settings.content: We offer bulk pricing on orders of 12 or more flags. If youâ€™d like more information please contact us.
